## isString() function

是否为字符串

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isString(a: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | any | 待校验的数据 |

**Returns:**

boolean

判断结果

## Example


```ts
import { isString } from '@dinofe/xt-core/common'
isString('foo') // true
isString({}) // false
```
